channel.title: What is Kubed on GitHub for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in What is Kubed on GitHub for Kubernetes

item.title: Kubed Overview
item.description: Kubed Kubed (pronounced Cube-Dee) by AppsCode is a Kubernetes Cluster Operator Daemon. Kubed can do the following things for you: Kubed can keep ConfigMaps and Secrets synchronized across Namespaces.
